thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: starstelle
title: Great Location
text:
This is my second time staying here.
Great location to many restaurants. Only an 8 minute walk to my job destination, which was a plus.
The room is very spacious and quiet. A great place to relax after working (or walking around window shopping). The staff is very helpful and polite. I would recommend this place.
